room_title: Escape room "Death By Chocolate" by Enigma Puzzle House in Bloomington (IN)
review: Had my surprise 30th party here and had a blast. The room Death by Chocolate was creative and challenging. Can't wait for more rooms to open!

room_title: Escape room "Death By Chocolate" by Enigma Puzzle House in Bloomington (IN)
review: My husband and I went today and had an absolute blast! Death by Chocolate has incredibly well-thought out clues that take time and ingenuity to figure out. The workers were very nice and talked to us about their business as well. I love that it's a local establishment that creates everything themselves. The puzzles, clues, and props are all made by them. We will definitely be returning to attempt the Dark Carnival next.

room_title: Escape room "Death By Chocolate" by Enigma Puzzle House in Bloomington (IN)
review: I went to Enigma Puzzle House on Saturday night in a group of 6 and had a fantastic time! The owner was so welcoming and very engaging. We did the Death by Chocolate room, which was fun with a huge variety of clues and interactions. I'll definitely go back for the Dark Carnival room and the other rooms listed on the website sound super cool, too!

room_title: Escape room "Death By Chocolate" by Enigma Puzzle House in Bloomington (IN)
review: Incredibly friendly staff and a great challenge! Death by Chocolate was a lot of fun. Would definitely recommend Enigma to others!
